name: Lemongrass-turkey salad with rice noodles and pear
description: Our custom lemongrass paste transforms simple ingredients into a Thai-inspired noodle salad. It’s refreshing, light, and as inviting to look at as it is to eat.

publisher.name: Sunbasket
publisher.description: Our meal kit plan delivers healthy recipes and organic & sustainable ingredients weekly, with menus for your lifestyle.

recipeIngredient: Sunbasket lemongrass paste (lemongrass - extra virgin olive oil - garlic - ginger - turmeric)
3 or 4 organic radishes (about ¼ pound total)
Sunbasket Thai dressing base (maple syrup - lime juice - fish sauce)
3 ounces organic baby kale or other leafy greens

recipeInstructions.name: Step 3
recipeInstructions.text: Prep the remaining ingredients; assemble the salad
